title: We Built A Powerful Linux Gaming PC That Makes The Steam Deck Jealous
description:
Dive into the ultimate gaming experience as we craft a small yet formidable Linux gaming rig, powered by the AMD Radeon RX 7900. Watch as we max out the latest games at 1440P effortlessly, thanks to Proton and a monstrous 16 Core 32Thread setup. This video is your guide to dominating gaming on Linux with a setup that's as sleek as it is powerful. Don't just play, dominate with our Steam Deck OS-inspired powerhouse. ThisVideo Is Sponsored by Filmora.
